transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello, ha sir kaise hai?
Customer: Hello, ha sir.
Executive: Ha Lekhraj ji, mai Parvez Alam IndiaMART office se baat kar raha hu. Kaise hai sir aap?
Customer: Badhiya sir.
Executive: Okay. Abhi aapse baat hui thi Priyanshu Dev ki. Abhi jo service chal rahi hai IndiaMART pe, free service channel star ki, hai na? To iske regarding
Executive: Aapki last baat hui thi pichle month me Dev Dev Mittal se baat hui thi IndiaMART pe.
Customer: Hai na?
Executive: Okay.
Executive: To ji. To mere paas jo update aaya hai aapki taraf se, aah, inquiries and leads ko lekar.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Ha boliye boliye.
Executive: Ha. Mai keh raha hu ki abhi kaisa hai response, kis tarike se chala rahe hai IndiaMART? Sahi hai, okay hai?
Customer: Sir mai thoda bahar hu sir. Baat karne ki position me nahi hu. Ek kaam kijiye aap 4 baje baat kijiye na ek baar.
Executive: 4 baje?
Customer: Ha, 4 baje baat kijiye na.
Executive: Chalo mai 4 baje baat karta hu. Okay okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Executive asks about the response on IndiaMART.

- Customer is currently outside and unable to talk.



Resolution:

- Executive agreed to call back at 4 PM.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back at 4 PM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- follow up, buyleads, subscription
